card.text: Tap two untapped creatures you control: This enchantment deals 1 damage to target opponent. Then if this enchantment has dealt 3 or more damage to an opponent this turn, sacrifice it. When you do, discard your hand and draw three cards.

card.text: Third Act (If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.) Mill three cards. card.name: Low Point

card.name: Team Up!
card.text: Blockbuster 4 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap four untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.) Choose one. card.name: Stand Off
card.text: Blockbuster 3 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap three untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.) Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If this spell is a blockbuster, repeat this process once.

card.text: Third Act (If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.) card.text: When this creature attacks with exactly one other creature, put a +1/+1 counter on each of those creatures. When this creature dies, put its counters on target creature you control.

card.text: Whenever you cast a spell with mana value 5 or greater, draw a card. Whenever a permanent you control with mana value 5 or greater dies, draw a card. When you draw your third card in a turn, sacrifice this enchantment.

card.text: Choose one — • Counter target noncreature spell with mana value 1 or 2. • Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Takedown of Bai-Ran
card.text: When this enchantment enters, target creature you control can't be blocked this turn. Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, draw a card.

card.name: Unravel the Code
card.text: Blockbuster 5 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap five untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.) Return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. If this spell is a blockbuster, create a copy of that card. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Deceiving Fist
card.text: Third Act (If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.) Counter target spell. If you're in your third act, exile its controller's graveyard. Until the end of your next turn, you may cast cards exiled this way and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

card.name: Never Found the Body
card.text: Third Act Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of your next end step unless you're in your third act.

card.name: Charming Minotaur
card.text: Trample Whenever you attack with this creature and exactly one other creature, create a Leading Role token attached to up to one target attacking creature. Untap it. (If you control another Role on it, put that one into the graveyard. Enchanted creature is legendary, gets +1/+1 and has vigilance.)

card.name: Reset Protocol
card.text: Blockbuster 5 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap five untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.) Return all creatures and planeswalkers to their owner's hands. If this spell is a blockbuster, each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library, then draws seven cards. Exile Reset Protocol.

card.name: Toxin
card.text: Trample When Toxin enters, return up to two target non-Mutant permanent cards from your graveyard to your hand. Whenever a card leaves your graveyard, put a +1/+1 counter on Toxin. This ability triggers only twice each turn.

card.name: Seth, Breaking Through
card.text: When Seth enters, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, you may activate loyalty abilities of Seth twice this turn rather than only once. [+1]: Up to one target creature has base power and toughness 1/1 until your next turn. [-3]: Seth deals 2 damage to any target. [-7]: Look at the top seven cards of your library. Put two of them into your hand. Put the rest in your graveyard.

card.name: Cohen, Archvillain
card.text: {5}{B}{B}: Return Cohen from your graveyard to the battlefield with a finality counter. Activate only as a sorcery. [+1]: Create a Blood token. [0]: Until end of turn, Cohen becomes a 4/4 Vampire creature with flying, lifelink, and indestructible. [-7]: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, target opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life." Then destroy all creatures.

card.name: Virtuous Knight
card.text: {W}: Create a Leading Role token attached to this creature. {W}{W}: Put two +1/+1 counters on this creature if it's legendary and it has no counters on it. {W}{W}{W}, {T}: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. Activate this ability only if this creature has power 4 or greater and only as a sorcery.

card.name: Search the Universe
card.text: Blockbuster 4 (As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may tap four untapped non-Aura permanents you control. If you do, this spell is a blockbuster.) Search your library for a legendary creature or planeswalker card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If this spell is a blockbuster, search your library for two legendary creature and/or planeswalker cards instead.

card.name: Admiral Joseph
card.text: Vigilance, ward {2} You may sacrifice another creature rather than pay the blockbuster cost of spells you control. If you sacrifice a creature this way, that spell can't be countered.

card.name: Mantle of the Empire
card.text: Third Act During your turn, as long as you're in your third act, you may cast spells from your hand without paying their mana costs. Whenever you cast a spell, you lose 2 life.

card.name: Siege Mastodon
card.text: Third Act (If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.) If you would create one or more creature tokens, if you're in your third act, instead create those tokens plus an additional two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

card.name: Kal Rod'r
card.text: {T}: Put a program counter on target creature. It's an artifact in addition to its other types. {B}, {T}: Destroy target artifact creature. {1}{W}, {T}: Exile target artifact creature. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: The Illusionist
card.text: Whenever this becomes the target of a spell or ability, if its power is less than 4, put a +1/+1 counter on it. Then it phases out. (Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.) Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, remove all counters from it and draw that many cards.

card.name: Lyndy
card.text: Menace When Lyndy enters, put a +1/+1 counter on her for each creature card in your graveyard. Sequel {1}{B}{G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its sequel cost. If you do, it enters with a finality counter and it's a 1/1.)

card.name: Ratrisha Rocket
card.text: Third Act Flying, first strike Whenever Ratrisha Rocket attacks, discard a card. When you do, exile the top card of target opponent's library. You may play that card this turn. If you're in your third act, create a Treasure token.

card.name: Germinating Grub
card.text: Third act {1}{G}{U}, Exile this card from your hand with a cocoon counter on it: Search your library for a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. You may cast this card from exile as long as it has a cocoon counter and you're in your third act.

card.name: Morgril, the Devastator
card.text: Third Act At the beginning of your upkeep, discard a card. When you do, Morgril deals 2 damage to each player. Morgril can't attack or block unless you're in your third act.

card.name: Skelly Boy Beatdown
card.text: Blockbuster X If this spell is a blockbuster, create X 1/1 black Skeleton creature tokens. Choose a creature you don't control at random. Skelly Boy Beatdown deals damage to that target equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Ortesian Sneak
card.text: Trample This creature gets +2/+2 as long as you control seven or more lands. Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. You may put a land card from your hand or the top of your library onto the battlefield.

card.name: Stormbringer Behemoth
card.text: Flash This spell can't be countered. Whenever you cast a spell, draw cards equal to that spell's mana value. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Monitor Room
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color among legendary creatures you control. {4}, {T}, Sacrifice this land: Return target legendary creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Family Friendly Hero
card.text: When this creature enters, return another target creature to its owner's hand. Sequel {4}{U} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its sequel cost. If you do, it enters with a finality counter and it's a 1/1.)

card.name: Hellbreach Heroine
card.text: When this creature enters, if it entered from your graveyard or you cast it from your graveyard, create two 1/1 black Horror creature tokens with deathtouch. Sequel {3}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its sequel cost. If you do, it enters with a finality counter and it's a 1/1.)

card.name: Colossal Kaiju
card.text: Vigilance, menace, reach, trample Sacrifice a land: This creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Sequel {3} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its sequel cost. If you do, it enters with a finality counter and it's a 1/1.)

card.name: One by One
card.text: Enchant creature At the beginning of each end step, if a creature didn't die this turn, enchanted creature's controller sacrifices it. Then that creature's controller chooses target creature. Return this enchantment from its owner's graveyard enchanting that creature. When there are one or fewer creatures on the battlefield, sacrifice this enchantment.

card.name: Guppy
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, exile another target creature. Return the exiled creature to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step. Guppy has all activated abilities of creatures exiled with it.

card.name: The Big Screen
card.text: When this battle enters, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand. Lands you control have "{T}: Add two mana of any one color." At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose from lifelink, flying, deathtouch, haste, and trample. Creatures you control gain the chosen ability until end of turn.

card.name: Dimensional Antenna
card.text: When this artifact enters, you may exile any number of cards from your hand. If you do, put that many cards you own from outside the game on top of your library. At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card. Spells you cast cost {2} less to cast.

card.name: Hero's Rise
card.text: Third Act (If your life total is less than half of your starting life total or if you have one or fewer cards in hand, you enter the Third Act for the rest of the game.) Creatures you control get +1/+1. At the beginning of combat on your turn, creatures you control gain flying until end of turn if you're in your third act.

card.name: Mikandros SOC
card.text: Flying
